newsitem.title: FRANCE: Nil value refund on EU daily wheat exports - Coceral.
newsitem.headline: Nil value refund on EU daily wheat exports - Coceral.

text.p: The European Union has replaced a 10-Ecu tax on daily exports of EU soft and durum wheat with a "nil" value refund or "dash", the Coceral EU grain trade association said on Friday.
Trade sources had initially said the tax, applying since mid-July, was being replaced with a zero refund.
Coceral explained that a "dash" does not allow the prefixing of licences and thus leaves exporters subject to a tax, should the EU decide to impose one, while the zero refund allows prefixing.
The EU grain committee took the decision at its weekly meeting on Thurday.
